languages.text: "Судя по первичной оценке радиационного фона, против них было использовано... оружие Адептус Механикус".
"Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."
languages.original_text: "Судя по первичной оценке радиационного фона, против них было использовано... оружие Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: “辐射背景模式的评估结果显示，攻击他们的似乎是……机械修会的武器。”
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."

traits.locale_text: “辐射背景模式的评估结果显示，攻击他们的似乎是……机械修会的武器。”
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: « D'après les premières analyses des radiations, il semble... qu'une arme de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ait été utilisée contre eux. »
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."

traits.locale_text: « D'après les premières analyses des radiations, il semble... qu'une arme de l'Adeptus Mechanicus ait été utilisée contre eux. »
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: «A juzgar por el nivel inicial de radiación, parece que los daños recibidos fueron provocados por el arma del Adeptus Mechanicus...».
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."

traits.locale_text: «A juzgar por el nivel inicial de radiación, parece que los daños recibidos fueron provocados por el arma del Adeptus Mechanicus...».
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: 「放射線バックグラウンドの初期評価によると…帝国技術局の兵器を攻撃に使ったもようです」
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."

traits.locale_text: 「放射線バックグラウンドの初期評価によると…帝国技術局の兵器を攻撃に使ったもようです」
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: "Nach initialer Analyse der Hintergrundstrahlung scheint es, dass ... ein Waffe des Adeptus Mechanicus gegen sie verwendet wurde."
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."

traits.locale_text: "Nach initialer Analyse der Hintergrundstrahlung scheint es, dass ... ein Waffe des Adeptus Mechanicus gegen sie verwendet wurde."
traits.speaker: MasterGunner

languages.text: "Radyasyon geçmişine ilişkin ilk ölçümlere göre... Bir Adeptus Mechanicus silahıyla vuruldukları anlaşılıyor."
languages.original_text: "Based on the initial radiation background assessment, it appears that... an Adeptus Mechanicus weapon has been used against them."
